__e: That nobody would ever go to Broadway and buy records, and we open up, and the people are lined up to get in.

When a man and a woman see each other and like each other, they ought to come together, wham, like a couple of taxis on Broadway, and not sit around analyzing each other like two specimens in a bottle.
Do you want to get off the subway at 72nd and Broadway and not even know you're in New York City?
